mapper.select: SELECT moim.MOIM_SEQ, moim.LEADER, moim.ACCOUNT_SEQ, moim.MNAME FROM user JOIN moim ON user.USER_SEQ = moim.LEADER JOIN user_moim ON moim.MOIM_SEQ = user_moim.MOIM_SEQ WHERE user_moim.USER_SEQ=#{user_seq};

SELECT user.NAME FROM user WHERE user.USER_SEQ IN (SELECT moim.leader FROM user JOIN moim ON user.USER_SEQ = moim.LEADER JOIN user_moim ON moim.MOIM_SEQ = user_moim.MOIM_SEQ WHERE user_moim.USER_SEQ=#{user_seq});
